hadiths.text: Ibn Umar (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger' (ﷺ) as saying:Do not buy fruits (on the trees) until their good condition becomes clear

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ الثِّمَارِ، قَبْلَ بُدُوِّ صَلاَحِهَا بِغَيْرِ شَرْطِ الْقَطْعِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of selling produce before its goodness appears
